title: 【同我推撚爆佢】向女權國際組織投訴黑警性侵女抗爭者

replies.msg:
啱啱開錯吹水台睇到個女仔咁樣俾人抬，仲冇埋底褲，我真係好嬲，嬲到好想喊。於是打咗篇嘢，要為佢爭取一絲尊嚴！

個demand未諗得好細，大家歡迎自己因應send嘅對象修改，或者俾下意見

我一陣send俾各大人權及女權組織，大家都幫手


Dear Sir/ Madam,

The Hong Kong Police Force sexually assaulted a female protester by seemingly removing her underwear while carrying her away in a recent protest happening in the outskirts of Hong Kong, Tin Shui Wai, at around 1 am on Aug 5. The issue needs your attention.

The photo published on Apple Daily clearly shows the woman’s lower body was exposed with a cloth suspected to be underclothes hanging on her leg while she was being carried away by a group of riot police.



https://hk.news.appledaily.com/breaking/realtime/article/20190805/59897632

Such a forcible and aggressive sexual violence performed by the Police Force is totally unacceptable.

We, Hongkongers, condemn such an excessive, unjust and dehumanising sexual aggression carried out by the Police.

We, too, ask the Police Force to stop exercising sexual oppression on demonstrators repeatedly. Concern groups in the city have issued a joint statement exposing the numerous sexual brutality carried out by the police on protesters since the Anti Extradition movement started in June.

https://thestandnews.com/politics/%E5%9C%98%E9%AB%94%E8%81%AF%E7%BD%B2%E8%81%B2%E6%98%8E-%E8%AD%B4%E8%B2%AC%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E4%BB%A5%E6%80%A7%E6%9A%B4%E5%8A%9B%E9%8E%AE%E5%A3%93%E7%A4%BA%E5%A8%81%E8%80%85/

We urge you to join us to raise the international awareness over the issue of Hong Kong Police performing sexual violence by spreading the issue by any means.

Sexual aggression is performed by the people with power not just to dehumanise the very nature of human-beings but, meanwhile, to refrain justice seekers from doing anything over the fear of being insulted, humiliated and dehumanised.

However, We will never bow down to any type of sexual violence towards bodies of all gender in any circumstances.

Please stand with us.

Best regards,
Hongkongers

大家幫幫手！為港女爭取返尊嚴
光復香港 時代革命

replies.msg:
全民dm Emma Watson.

https://instagram.com/emmawatson?igshid=b5y3xa4gke0u

IG傳送門

Hello Emma,

We're writing to express concern over an incident involving the violation of female rights that has just happened in Hong Kong. As you may have noticed, Hong Kongers are currently experiencing police brutality on a daily basis during the process of fighting aginst the extradition bill imposed by the HK government. Earlier just now a female protestor was arrested near a local police station, during which her pants were violently ripped off against her will. The police officers made no attempt to protect her privacy which was unacceptable on any level. Since the beginning of the protests in June not one of our local feminist organizations have stood out for female rights.

We are in desperate times and sincerely seek your help in raising international concern over this matter as we can foresee more inicidents like this one are going to happen in the near future if nothing is done to stop police brutality. Thanks a lot for your time!

A group of concerned Hong Kongers

死黑警我屌晒你地老母呀！

個demand未諗得好細，大家歡迎自己因應send嘅對象修改，或者俾下意見

我一陣send俾各大人權及女權組織，大家都幫手


Dear Sir/ Madam,

The Hong Kong Police Force sexually assaulted a female protester by seemingly removing her underwear while carrying her away in a recent protest happening in the outskirts of Hong Kong, Tin Shui Wai, at around 1 am on Aug 5. The issue needs your attention.

The photo published on Apple Daily clearly shows the woman’s lower body was exposed with a cloth suspected to be underclothes hanging on her leg while she was being carried away by a group of riot police.



https://hk.news.appledaily.com/breaking/realtime/article/20190805/59897632

Such a forcible and aggressive sexual violence performed by the Police Force is totally unacceptable.

We, Hongkongers, condemn such an excessive, unjust and dehumanising sexual aggression carried out by the Police.

We, too, ask the Police Force to stop exercising sexual oppression on demonstrators repeatedly. Concern groups in the city have issued a joint statement exposing the numerous sexual brutality carried out by the police on protesters since the Anti Extradition movement started in June.

https://thestandnews.com/politics/%E5%9C%98%E9%AB%94%E8%81%AF%E7%BD%B2%E8%81%B2%E6%98%8E-%E8%AD%B4%E8%B2%AC%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E4%BB%A5%E6%80%A7%E6%9A%B4%E5%8A%9B%E9%8E%AE%E5%A3%93%E7%A4%BA%E5%A8%81%E8%80%85/

We urge you to join us to raise the international awareness over the issue of Hong Kong Police performing sexual violence by spreading the issue by any means.

Sexual aggression is performed by the people with power not just to dehumanise the very nature of human-beings but, meanwhile, to refrain justice seekers from doing anything over the fear of being insulted, humiliated and dehumanised.

However, We will never bow down to any type of sexual violence towards bodies of all gender in any circumstances.

Please stand with us.

Best regards,
Hongkongers

光復香港 時代革命

Dear Sir/ Madam,

The Hong Kong Police Force sexually assaulted a female protester by seemingly removing her underwear while carrying her away in a recent protest happening in the outskirts of Hong Kong, Tin Shui Wai, at around 1 am on Aug 5. The issue needs your attention.

The photo published on Apple Daily clearly shows the woman’s lower body was exposed with a cloth suspected to be underclothes hanging on her leg while she was being carried away by a group of riot police.



English News: https://www.dimsumdaily.hk/riot-police-pull-off-pants-of-female-protesters-during-arrest-outside-tin-shui-wai-police-station/

Chinese News: https://hk.news.appledaily.com/breaking/realtime/article/20190805/59897632

Such a forcible and aggressive sexual violence performed by the Police Force is totally unacceptable.

We, Hongkongers, condemn such an excessive, unjust and dehumanising sexual aggression carried out by the Police.

We, too, ask the Police Force to stop exercising sexual oppression on demonstrators repeatedly. Concern groups in the city have issued a joint statement exposing the numerous sexual brutality carried out by the police on protesters since the Anti Extradition movement started in June.

https://thestandnews.com/politics/%E5%9C%98%E9%AB%94%E8%81%AF%E7%BD%B2%E8%81%B2%E6%98%8E-%E8%AD%B4%E8%B2%AC%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E4%BB%A5%E6%80%A7%E6%9A%B4%E5%8A%9B%E9%8E%AE%E5%A3%93%E7%A4%BA%E5%A8%81%E8%80%85/

Hongkongers

We, Hongkongers, condemn such an excessive, unjust and dehumanising sexual aggression carried out by the Police.

We, too, ask the Police Force to stop exercising sexual oppression on demonstrators repeatedly. Concern groups in the city have issued a joint statement exposing the numerous sexual brutality carried out by the police on protesters since the Anti Extradition movement started in June.

https://thestandnews.com/politics/%E5%9C%98%E9%AB%94%E8%81%AF%E7%BD%B2%E8%81%B2%E6%98%8E-%E8%AD%B4%E8%B2%AC%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E4%BB%A5%E6%80%A7%E6%9A%B4%E5%8A%9B%E9%8E%AE%E5%A3%93%E7%A4%BA%E5%A8%81%E8%80%85/

We urge you to join us to raise the international awareness over the issue of Hong Kong Police performing sexual violence by spreading the issue by any means.

Sexual aggression is performed by the people with power not just to dehumanise the very nature of human-beings but, meanwhile, to refrain justice seekers from doing anything over the fear of being insulted, humiliated and dehumanised.

However, We will never bow down to any type of sexual violence towards bodies of all gender in any circumstances.

Please stand with us.

Best regards,
Hongkongers

The Hong Kong Police Force sexually assaulted a female protester by seemingly removing her underwear while carrying her away in a recent protest happening in the outskirts of Hong Kong, Tin Shui Wai, at around 1 am on Aug 5. The issue needs your attention.

The photo published on Apple Daily clearly shows the woman’s lower body was exposed with a cloth suspected to be underclothes hanging on her leg while she was being carried away by a group of riot police.
